Notes of the book Python Data Science Handbook

links:

- https://github.com/jakevdp/WhirlwindTourOfPython
- https://github.com/jakevdp/PythonDataScienceeHandbook

# IPython

- Accessing documentation with '?'
- Accessing source code with '??'
 
 %paste : copy and paste code without format errors
 
 %cpaste : copy and paste chunks of code without format errors
 
%run myscript.py : runs file within your current session
